1115964692802019328.text: Scientists have obtained the first image of a black hole, using Event Horizon Telescope observations of the center of the galaxy M87. The image shows a bright ring formed as light bends in the intense gravity around a black hole that is 6.5 billion times more massive than the Sunpic.twitter.com/AymXilKhKe

993340389456207872.text: After quite a few failures with existing hashdump modules (they constantly stop or crash), I thought I'd throw together something that would abuse Mimikatz's dcsync to do it remotely. It's a little hack, but it works! It also streams the results rather than doing them as a batch.

993340644042072065.text:
This means:
* No more pulling of ntds.dit
* No more breaking of modules
* No need to actually get on the DC at all.

It requires use of the Powershell extension though.

Let me know what you think! https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-payloads/pull/284 …
